question.title: Twilio: move existing call to the conference
question.body:
My application works this way: a customer calls a certain DID, Twilio launches the webhook to my app, and then my app connects the customer to a specific manager. The manager has to press "1" to accept the call and to start a conversation to the customer. This is achieved by using verb:

        var gather = new Gather.Builder()
                .action(ACCEPTED_CALL_PATH)
                .numDigits(1)
                .inputs(Gather.Input.DTMF)
                .timeout(10);

The route stated in ACCEPTED_CALL_PATH checks that "1" was pressed. After this, I want to start a conference and add the manager to it, so that the calls to third parties can be made later. How this can be achieved?
